posts.post_content: As the title states, I'm looking for two specific T202's: Ty Cobb Steals Third (Jennings), and Athletics Infield (Baker). I'm looking for low graded examples (most likely in the Authentic to 3 range) but could be convinced to buy better ones. If you have any of these and are interested in selling, please send me a PM. Thanks for your time!
Thanks Mike Healer for helping me scratch one off the want list!
